description:
Allow administrators to define custom preview card layouts for each entity type, controlling which fields, relationships, and metadata appear in hover previews, search results, and embedded references.

**Rationale:** Different organizations prioritize different information when scanning entities. Customizable previews ensure users see the most relevant context at a glance, improving efficiency and reducing unnecessary clicks.
title: Customizable Entity Card Preview Templates
